content: these socks were inspired by the star wars universe and the force that flows through each living thing the cables represent the push and pull of the dark and the light side of the force and ultimately its long sought after balance i hope you enjoy knitting these socks and may the force be with you this pattern incudes written and charted instructions it is written to be knitted from the cuff down and includes 3 sizes small 56 sts medium 64 sts and large 72 sts yarn and notions yarn 100g fingering weight sample in smooth sock fingering by alley cat yarns colourway ooak alley cat yarns website https //alleycatyarns ca/collections/smooth-sock needles 2 5 mm needles see note below with a long cable for magic loop or use your preferred needles such as 9 in circulars or dpns this pattern features cables which tend to make knits a little tighter i went up a needle size to 2 5mm for that reason if you are a naturally tight knitter you may wish to go up to 2 75 mm other notions cable needle stitch markers scissors darning needle gauge 8 sts = 1 inch in stockinette nota bene special instructions for shortie socks are in blue at the end of the written instructions other options for a different cuff and alternate heel flap are in purple throughout the main instructions
